# hasGravityAndUserAcceleration

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides gravity and user acceleration data.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasGravityAndUserAcceleration: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the controller provides both gravity and user acceleration data; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Related Documentation

- **gravity**: The gravity acceleration vector from the controller’s reference frame.
- **userAcceleration**: The acceleration that the user applies to the controller.

## Verifying Capabilities

- **hasAttitude**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides attitude data.
- **hasRotationRate**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides rotation data.
- **hasAttitudeAndRotationRate**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides attitude and rotation data.
